title: Looking for a Nice Serif Typeface for a Logotype
content:
Hi all,

Does anyone here have a really nice serif typeface to recommend for a logotype? Preferably in lowercase and bold weight with the potential to look a little quirky!
author: neuralism

comments.content: Personally, I would recommend something by Nick Shinn ( _[Parity](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417141121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/parity/)_, _[Panoptica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417141121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/panoptica/)_, _[Sensibility](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417141121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/sensibility/)_) or _[Satyr](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417141121/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fmonokrom.no/fonts/satyr)_ by Monokrom.
